alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lafayette, northeastern Yalobusha, northern Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springdale, or near Water Valley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Springdale, Banner, Tula, Randolph, Paris, Taylor, Toccopola, Robbs, Delay, Matthews, Sarepta and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
